text: wnqss ealayk -ayha alnby- min 'akhbar alrusul aldhyn kanuu qblk, kl ma tahtaj 'iilayh mimaa yqwwi qalbik lilqiam baeba' alrsalt, waqad ja'ak fi hadhih alswrt wama ashtamalat ealayh min akhbar, bayan alhaqi aladhi 'ant elyh, waja'ak fiha maweizat yrtde biha alkafrwn, wdhkra yatadhakar biha almuminun biallah wrslh
